idea-plugin.name: Angular CLI QuickSwitch
idea-plugin.description: This plugin allows you to quickly navigate between files, which correspond to the same component (e.g. generated by the Angular CLI). By pressing the corresponding shortcut (defaults to Alt + S) the IDE will cycle (i.e. close current tab and open a new one instead) amongst the *.ts, *.js, *.html, *.css and *.scss file of one component.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Added support for pure JavaScript files.

action.description: Quickly switches between ts/js/html/css/scss files for one component
